resources.string: - Change app background\n- Toggle between light and dark mode\n- Dynamic coloring with Material3 colors (coming soon)
Easly just click on any Profile "Card" inside the main Screen and you are Ready to go!

RAM management options
Kernel adjustments
Force closing features
And many more will come!

Stratosphere Performance is a powerful Android app designed to work seamlessly with the upcoming Magisk module Stratosphere Performance v3.0. \n\nIt allows users to manage various performance profiles, customize settings and enjoying an enhanced Android experience.

Without storage access, the app cannot function properly. Please grant the necessary permission. 

Don't worry, we won't bite üòÅ

Actually, the access is just needed to change the in-app background.
